DryadDataFile.dcterms:creator: Schlossberg, Maxim
McGraw, Benjamin
Sebring, Ryan
DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: 24-h urea-N volatilization data
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Following the header row, this file contains 100 rows of 24-h ammonia volatilization rate/quantity, corrected for background and collected in the field using flux chambers, following 20 kg/ha foliar application of aqueous urea-N (per conventional or stabilized/amended urea products). HEADERS (row 1): Col 1 is year (data collected), Col 2 is experimental run (EXP RUN). Col 3 is block (nested in EXP RUN). Col 4 is urea fertilizer treatment (TRT). Col 5 is measured kg-N/ha lost. Col 6 is chamber-efficiency-adjusted kg-N/ha lost.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Dynamic
flux
gaseous emissions
nitrogen
turfgrass
urease inhibitor
N-(n-butyl) thiophosphoric triamide
